storyInfo: The Rhodes Island operators reach a cooperative agreement with Team Rainbow. Both sides agree to act conservatively, focusing on defense of the safehouse while avoiding the broader political turmoil brewing outside.

attributes.content: You can do it! Lord!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Hnng... Grrrgh! Gah...!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Almost! Just a little more!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: And... Hah!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: It's up!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Well done!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Yes... It's very impressive you can pull back this crossbow with your bare hands.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: What a design. You couldn't tell by looking at it that this crossbow has such tensile strength.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: It's a pretty ordinary crossbow. Most Sarkaz can lock it barehanded.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: A heavy crossbow with this kind of power... at least than one hundred meters, it won't be that different from a gun. It's just too much work.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: ...And I already learned the hard way that bit about our physical differences.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: That zappy girl over there might be no weaker than me.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Are you talking about Liskarm? She's a Vouivre. They're a strong race, for sure.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Right......
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Why the sudden interest in these weapons?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: We're expecting a lot of fights soon, so it's time to think about what to do when we run out of ammo.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Without bullets, my gun might as well be a paperweight.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I don't think we can take them hand-to-hand when it comes to that. And our training and experience won't be enough either.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: How much do we have left?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Not much over here. Not even four hundred rounds.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Let me show you something.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Is this a... bullet?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: It's a bullet that Rhodes Islander named Liskarm uses. They call it an 'etched bullet,' and it's apparently an extremely expensive commodity.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Did you take it apart yet?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: What's it made of? What's the propellant?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: This chunk of crystal.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Looks like an energy source. Is that a propellant or a warhead?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: A Laterano gunsmith once told me that every single etched bullet contains a miniature casting unit that matches up with the structure of a Laterano gun.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: That means it's not only the gun, but every etched bullet, is basically a caster's staff. That's why they're so expensive, and why they need such complicated Arts that only Sankta can make much use of them.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Other peoples go with easier ranged weapons.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: So Laterano is the name of the country, Sankta is the name of the race. Laterano people are not necessarily Sankta... Got it.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: But that's real bad news about the bullets.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Do we have any gun here that doesn't require those 'Originium Arts' to work?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: I've never heard about those firearms that don't need Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: (Sigh)...
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: One step at a time. At least everybody can use explosives.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Where did Kötz go with them?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: They're in the basement. Still trying to fix the thing that looks like a radio transmitter.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: We can't power the comm casting unit.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It's a power problem?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Maybe... I'll have to see.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Okay, you all take a step back. The valedictorian is about to do her stuff.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: ...Charging...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Oh! Ooh! Oooh!
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Was that Arts? It was pretty cool.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: It definitely... leaves an impression.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Is it working?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It's on!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Great work. That's my walking power supply.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Don't you have anything better to do than annoy me?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: No good. It's still not connecting.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: The crystal electronics unit may be too damaged. Or there may be some damage somewhere else in the circuit we can't see with the naked eye.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: We don't have any equipment for repairing Originium circuits here, so we can't troubleshoot.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: *Sigh*, sounds pretty hopeless.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Can ordinary people do these Originium Arts too?
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Theoretically... almost anyone can learn to do Arts at some level, with enough training.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It's just that studying Arts takes time and effort, and that gets tied up pretty close with talent.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Lots of people master only the most basic Arts, even after pushing themselves a lot harder than others.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I'm a dumb old man, and I've never learned any Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: What are you thinking?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Nothing... Just brainstorming about our situation here... some wild, impractical ideas.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: Oh, right, Mr. Kötz.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Take a look at this shield here.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: What's... what's that on the shield?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I installed a high-powered spotlight and a universal Originium circuit based on the original design and function of your shield. It should work just like you're used to.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Thanks a bundle!
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: ...Oh... But I can't use 'Originium Arts'.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Strictly speaking, a universal Originium circuit is a piece of modern technology that lets people who don't know how to use Arts use it anyway. It is loaded with a few simple Originium Arts.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Of course, the power supply and equipment maintenance still need to be carried out by a trained caster.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: All right, let's see. It's still pretty heavy.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: ...Turn it on... Hit the switch...
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: All good. I'll give it a try.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Wow! It really works!
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: But it'll take some getting used to.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: I haven't done a shield charge in six months. I've almost forgotten how to use the thing.
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: How are things looking outside?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: The last attack was also the last enemy movement. We haven't seen any probing strikes since. I don't think that's a good sign.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Especially considering what a well-organized bunch of punks they are, I've got a bad feeling about this.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: The calm before the storm.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Sure enough.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Where's the doctor?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Resting. He hasn't slept in days.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Give the kid a break.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: He shouldn't have to deal with all this at his age.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: And we've got another problem on our hands. We're running out of food.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Right. Mr. Occphen told us.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: What are you thinking?
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: I'm thinking whether or not we should take a trip back to the Infected quarter.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: I get you.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: Oh? You have a plan?
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: We left in a hurry. A lot of the sick people didn't have time to bring their food from home.
attributes.name: Frost

attributes.content: True. We have enough hands here. We could send some people out to get supplies.
attributes.name: Rangers

attributes.content: Then let's save our talk here. We should be able to get there before the night falls.
attributes.name: Ash
